name: RIOT
tag_list: social-media, socialmedia, digital, advertising, agency, social-media-agency, brazil, latin-america, latam, content, contedo, mdias-sociais, midias-sociais, midiassociais, mdiassociais
description: First social media agency in LatAm
overview:
The first and largest social media agency in Latin America.

Since 2006, Riot has been helping companies invest and settle their position on social media. We know that the most important thing for a brand is to be near its public. We do it in a simple, effective way by associating strategy and creation. Over the last five years, we developed a strong methodology, social platforms, tools, and actions directed to different brands and segments.

We connect brand and public in a unique manner, generating content and activities with a focus on relationship and engagement. We create applications and actions focused on the profile of users who are on our clients’ channels.

We know the paths to develop a relationship with the target and to attract people who may potentially relate to the brand’s concept. That’s what we do best.

offices.address1: Av. Santos Dumont, 1789, sl 503. Ed. Potenza
